events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized as an Auto Accident based on keywords found in the report.
An agent specializing in vehicle collision cases was assigned to handle the customer's claim promptly.
The customer received an acknowledgment confirming that their accident claim is being processed.
Request sent to customer for accident photos, police report, and vehicle repair estimates.
The customer successfully uploaded all requested documents including photos and official reports.
Claims adjuster began reviewing submitted evidence to assess the extent of damages and liability.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and detailed damage assessment documentation.
An initial settlement offer was sent to the customer outlining compensation for vehicle repairs.
Customer responded positively, agreeing with the proposed settlement amount and repair timeline.
The claim was formally approved by the insurer after customer acceptance of the settlement.
The agreed settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account without delay.
The insurance claim was officially closed following successful payment and repair confirmation.
All claim records and correspondence were securely archived for future reference and compliance.
